name: Heli Justice Combat 2030
description:
Heli combat is the most immersive and realistic helicopter battle action game. Launch the attack on the most dangerous future combat now.Air Helicopter War game there are unlimited achieve game.To start the mission you need to start up chopper first from the home base and fly towards the strike future area.When your helicopter enter the death zone of your strike area mission is to aim then plan to strike the targeted point and protect yourself from their fire and rocket launcher.The enemy is very strong but you are well trained chopper striker.So just show your skills and beat the enemy.The sound quality is good, you will hear a real sound of strike with thrill and terror.We have introduces awesome graphics for this game.
Guide with precision your conflict helicopter and demolish the enemy in the future world’s greatest conflict experience! Enemy Strike combines tactics, flying skills and the right amount of ruthless in this military helicopter action game.Your cautious helicopter is armory to show down enemy.Keep a strong and steady aim, along with extremely accurate flight seamanship skills to take down enemies from a distance.If you are lover of Combat battlefield action strike then this game only for you.In this game you will find chopper that will attack.The flying helicopter entered in gunship air war zone and bombarded on tiny striker.the enemies have dead weapon and fire rockets on your army rc helicopter.Can you handle the action in this cool 2D action simulation game? Use your flying skills.Turn your Heli towards future Terrorist’s Base camp.
Now the commandos are flying around in helicopter and killing the future enemies from a higher altitude.Modern Heli Gunship War is an easy to play yet very exciting game.This game includes the combination of excellent graphics,Air force striker techniques and strategy of war and an amazing set of gun fire. The more you play more intense it gets.
Features:
-Thrilling and action adventure
-Smooth and simple Heli control system
-Good quality and Realistic sound effects
-Target the enemies sharply
-Exciting mission and full of fun
